channel.title: Exodus on Follow me and I shall make you fishers of men.
channel.description: Recent content in Exodus on Follow me and I shall make you fishers of men.

item.title: Exodus 20:1-3,7-8,12-17
item.description: 1 And God spake all these words, saying, 2 I am the LORD thy God, which have brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage. 3 Thou shalt have no other gods before me. 7 Thou shalt not take the name of the LORD thy God in vain; for the LORD will not hold him guiltless that taketh his name in vain. 8 Remember the sabbath day, to keep it holy.
